title: Police: Man shot from 'accidental discharge' at Lynchburg apartment complex
content:
LYNCHBURG, Va. (WSET) -- Lynchburg Police are investigating what they are calling an "accidental discharge" that happened at Legacy at Linden Park apartment complex.
Police responded to 1000 Misty Mountain Rd. around 4 p.m. in reference to shots fired. They say one person was rushed to the hospital.
Right now, we know that police are not actively searching for anyone and it is not a criminal investigation as police believe that this was an accidental shooting.
